channel.title: PC help?
channel.description: Well, its about my keyboard. It works fine when i run in bios but freezes up as soon as the windows 2000 startup screens appears. When the login screen comes on and i pess a key the mouse freezes and i cant type anything. Anyhelp? Also this is a ps/2 keyboard that i'd like to use for gaming reasons.. My usb keyboard works fine but i dont like it very much. No spam or idiots please only intelligent comments needed.

item.title: PC help?
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

You need to upgrade to Y2K software/hardware. Use your USB keyboard and get XP/Linux.

Read full topic
